name: Neural Overdrive Stim
description: A potent blend of nootropics and neuro-stimulants designed to temporarily amplify neural processing speed. Use with caution: extended use can lead to permanent neurological damage.

attributes.effect: Heals (25% of max health) to all parties for 3 charges

flavor.rationale: In a world where information is currency, edge runners need every advantage they can get. Neural Overdrive Stims provide that temporary boost in mental acuity and reaction time needed for high-stakes heists or corporate espionage.
